name: Clay CALDWELL, Petitioner v. Hon. Jeffrey R. MINEHART, Respondent

parties: Clay CALDWELL, Petitioner v. Hon. Jeffrey R. MINEHART, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of August, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
97 A.3d 734
Clay CALDWELL, Petitioner v. Hon. Jeffrey R. MINEHART, Respondent.
No. 74 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 8, 2014.
